text: Allan Fotheringham (August 31, 1932 â€“ August 19, 2020) was a Canadian newspaper and magazine journalist, columnist and television presenter. He was known for his many columns that appeared in Vancouver Sun, Toronto Sun, The Globe and Mail and National Post. He was also a panelist on Front Page Challenge between 1984 to 1995. He died on August 19, 2020 in Quebec at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian columnists Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Writers from Saskatchewan Category:University of British Columbia alumni
title: Allan Fotheringham
